title: Hunter Valley Boutique Estate with Championship Golf Course & Onsite Sydney Brewery
description: Leave city life behind with a lavish retreat to Crowne Plaza Hunter Valley, an IHG Hotel, hidden among the vineyards and cellar doors of the striking Hunter Valley wine region. Amid rolling hills, you'll delight in a European estate-inspired stay that brings a little piece of Tuscany to New South Wales, with its own onsite brewery, Sydney Brewery, the largest display of Hunter Valley-inspired art, a sprawling pool and an 18-hole championship golf course.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hunter Valley, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 430 Wine Country Drive, Lovedale, NSW 2325, Australia
